updates.addMessage: function(doc,req){ receiver = []; if(!req.query.to) {receiver.push('@global');} else {receiver = JSON.parse(req.query.to);} return [{ _id: req.id, owner: req.userCtx.name, to: receiver, message: req.query.message, created: new Date(), type: 'message'},'new Message'];}
updates.joinGroup: function(doc,req){ if(doc){ if(doc.owner != req.userCtx.name){return [doc, 'nothing changed'];}else{  if(doc.filter.indexOf(req.query.filter)<0) {doc.filter.push(req.query.filter);} return[doc, 'added Filter']; } }else { return[{_id: 'filter-'+req.userCtx.name, filter:[req.query.filter], owner: req.userCtx.name, type:'filter'}, 'new filterdoc'];}}

shows.time: function(doc, req){ var now = new Date(); var output = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(now)); return { code:200, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, body: output}; }
